snippet.title: Pro Yakyuu Team o Tsukurou! 2003 (PS2) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Here's a good chunk of gameplay from Pro Yakyuu Team o Tsukurou! 2003 (Pro Baseball Team Maker 2003), a PlayStation 2 game by Sega. 

This game is all about creating, customizing, and running your own team, so it's a lot of menus for most of this video. Here are some timestamps if you want to see certain things: 

00:00 Start screen
00:20 Choose which real pro team to replace and choose logo
00:51 Uniform customization
02:32 Choose your secretary
03:28 Create a character to play on your team
08:40 Choose coaching staff
13:35 Training camp starts
22:37 Preseason game sim vs. Giants starts
29:44 "Watch Game" mode
